#summary How to change the log level without modify code

= Introduction =

How to change the log level without modify code.


= Details =

The are two ways to change log level
  * Command line: --log-level=V|D|I|W|E
  * Config: log-level=V|D|I|W|E

  * V show all message >= FTK_LOG_V
  * D show all message >= FTK_LOG_D
  * I show all message >= FTK_LOG_I
  * W show all message >= FTK_LOG_W
  * E show all message >= FTK_LOG_E
